channel.title: Michael Jackson
channel.description:
For some of you who don't know anything about Michael Jackson, he's dead and his first death anniversary is in 9 days time.
If you've searched on the Internet about his death caused by the Illuminati, it's really interesting. Do you believe in it?
inb4 Davidi2 saying "Everybody already knew this?"

item.title: Michael Jackson
item.dc:creator: @Elitobot Elitobot
item.description:
@Elitobot wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:15, topic:344399”][quote author=Elitobot link=topic=440781.msg3238680#msg3238680 date=1276717581]
Everyone who does not know what Illuminati is read this http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Illuminati

Personally after reading what Illuminati stood for, it could be a possibility. I really need to watch those videos though because I am not sure why he would get caught up in the NWO or killed because of the people in the shadows. Although its a possibility I don’t even see how that’s relevant, I’d assume these “people” would target someone like Obama, not a VET popstar :|.
[/quote]
You should watch the video and find out that Michael Jackson had been speaking to his audience about him being “manipulated” and he wanted the Illuminati to stop. One of the few songs prepared for his concert which never happened was “They Don’t Care About Us”. The lyrics are interesting assuming it really meant about the Illuminati.

[quote=Lyrics]Tell me what has become of my rights
Am I invisible because you ignore me?
Your proclamation promised me free liberty, now
I’m tired of bein’ the victim of shame[/quote]
Others believe that Michael Jackson, and to repeat myself in the above post, Tupac and Bob Marley’s deaths happened because they wanted to reveal the “conspiracy” of the Illuminati.

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=440781.msg3238735#msg3238735 date=1276720404]

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sJi2HaJf1VI
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SW43Mig1LYE

You sirs must watch it.
[/quote]thats scary shit dude. i almost dont wanna listen to music anymore lol

I think only mainstream singers’ songs are the ones you shouldn’t listen to. Almost every mainstream singer are Illuminati puppets. Lady Gaga and Rihanna are two.[/quote]
Finished watching it. I was researching shadow government, and secret societies for almost 4 hours. That Yes We Can = Thank-you Satan is what really got to me :eek:.

Read full topic

item.title: Michael Jackson
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Gregory says he asked Jackson when the last time he ate was, because he didn't look well, and that Jackson told him -- quote -- "They're trying to poison me." He asked him when he last drank water, and he said Jackson told him again -- quote -- "They're trying to kill me." - http://transcripts.cnn.com/TRANSCRIPT...
Some artists are Anti-New World Order as well, such as Tupac, Bob Marley and Michael Jackson, some are just puppets, a tool for brainwashing and manipulating people. Illuminati self-expose themselves to a certain extent, because they believe it gives them power. This is also why Washington DC's design is full of Satanic symbols. Michael Jackson was murdered because he was going to expose a "conspiracy". There is a video of him saying this, search for it.

Read full topic
